dcterms:creator: E. Parada-Cabaleiro
G. Costantini
A. Batliner
M. Schmitt
B. Schuller
dcterms:description: The Database of Elicited Mood in Speech (DEMoS) is an Italian speech corpus consisting of 7.7 hours of audio recordings from 68 participants, featuring 9,365 audio samples categorized into seven emotional states: anger, disgust, fear, guilt, happiness, sadness, and surprise.
dcterms:title: DEMoS
